column1: Little Goat Diner////Delightful meal!! Great portion sizes and gracious service. Don't let the diner label misguide you! The food here is superb and the quality of the produce
column4: and meat is amazing. Even if you are starving when you come in
column5: beware of the generous portion sizes. Share your food!! Even if it's just to try as many items as you can! (Personal vegetarian favorites / hash browns and vegetarian quesadilla)
